title: Sling Streaming Deal: Get 50% Off Your First Month — Plus, Get an Additional $5 Off When You Bundle With Max
description: Sling is offering streaming savings left and right. Here are the platform’s best active offers, including a major deal on your first month and a discount when you bundle with Max to stream shows like Hacks, The Last of Us, The Pitt and more. Sling TV is a TVLine sponsor, however, this article was independently written […]

title: Grey’s Anatomy Preview: Monica Is There When Amelia Needs Her Most
description: We were starting to wonder whether Grey’s Anatomy forgot that Amelia and Monica were almost a thing. But the preview for Thursday’s “Papa Was a Rollin’ Stone” reveals that the colleagues and occasional flirtmates are back in one another’s orbit. That’s the good news. And the bad? The circumstances that bring the docs back together […]
author: Charlie Mason

title: Characters of the Week: Tracker, The Last of Us & Chicago PD Deliver Strong Episodes and Characters
